item.title: Zuckerberg Debuts 'Real Mark' in Push to Woo Trump
item.description: Meta is pursuing a MAGA makeover, in the latest political pivot for a company that once banned the now-president-elect from its platforms.

item.title: Meta to Cut 5% of Staff as Zuckerberg Says He Will 'Raise the Bar'
item.description: CEO Mark Zuckerberg said the job cuts are necessary as the company builds “the most important technologies in the world.”

item.title: Amazon Web Services Launches Infrastructure Region in Mexico
item.description: The cloud business of Amazon.com has launched an infrastructure cloud region in Mexico and plans to invest $5 billion in the country over the next 15 ...
